titleStmt.title: The present great interest both of king and people in a letter written to one of the Lords of the Privy-Council / by a lover of his king and country.
titleStmt.author: F. K.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Plymouth, Sept. 16, 1679. F.K.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
